mapper.insert: insert into rentHouseLoanBase (rentHouseLoanID, dclsMonth, comNum, prdNum, comName, prdName, joinWay, loanInciExpn, erlyRpayFee, dlyRate, loanLimit, dclsStart) values (#{rentHouseLoanID}, #{dclsMonth}, #{comNum}, #{prdNum}, #{comName}, #{prdName}, #{joinWay}, #{loanInciExpn}, #{erlyRpayFee}, #{dlyRate}, #{loanLimit}, #{dclsStart})

insert into rentHouseLoanOption (rentHouseLoanID, dclsMonth, comNum, prdNum, rpayTypeName, lendRateTypeName, lendRateMin, lendRateMax, lendRateAvg) values (#{rentHouseLoanID}, #{dclsMonth}, #{comNum}, #{prdNum}, #{rpayTypeName}, #{lendRateTypeName}, #{lendRateMin}, #{lendRateMax}, #{lendRateAvg})
mapper.select: SELECT b.rentHouseLoanID, comName, prdName, joinWay, loanInciExpn, erlyRpayFee, dlyRate, loanLimit, rpayTypeName, lendRateTypeName, lendRateMin, lendRateMax, lendRateAvg FROM rentHouseLoanBase as b inner join rentHouseLoanOption as o on b.rentHouseLoanID = o.rentHouseLoanID

SELECT * FROM rentHouseLoanBase as rb inner join rentHouseLoanOption as ro on rb.rentHouseLoanID = ro.rentHouseLoanID
WHERE comName like CONCAT('%', #{prdName}, '%') AND joinWay like CONCAT('%', #{joinWay}, '%') AND rpayTypeName like CONCAT('%', #{rpayTypeName}, '%')
